title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate embeddings, pull/manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embeddings, tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: simple interface to chat and generate embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot UI that talks to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to integrate Ollama models into workflows.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that need local LLM generation or testing.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization and Q&A on your notes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your knowledge graph.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapper exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints over Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform-provider
summary: Terraform provider to manage Ollama models and configurations as code.
